One of the key components of a responsive website is a navbar that adapts to different screen sizes. In this tutorial, we will explore how to build responsive navbars using Bootstrap 5.3. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on building responsive navbars using Bootstrap 5.3. The scope of this tutorial covers the basic usage of Bootstrap classes and components to create responsive navbars. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To follow along with this tutorial, you will need the following: - Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS - Bootstrap 5.3 installed in your project - A text editor or an integrated development environment (IDE) ### Step-by-Step Instructions 1.
